title: Description
detail:
DevFest 2023, which is short for "Developers Festival," is a yearly tech event organized by Google Developers Groups.
At DevFest, you can meet other tech enthusiasts, learn new things, and stay updated on the latest tech trends.

title: format and timeline
detail: Devfest'23 will cover two main tracks: Challenges happening online on October 26th, where you can tackle tech problems while learning and growing your skills, and the Hackathon on November 30th, where you can unleash your creativity to create a practical solution, work on it, competing againt other participants.

title: Participants number
detail:
The challenges part, which takes place on October 26th, allows an unlimited number of participants to join online.
As for the Hackathon on November 30th, we are expecting 100 participants to compete and showcase their technical skills.

title: Structure
detail: There will be two tracks: a hackathon and online challenges

title: Timeline and place
detail:
Date: October 26th, 2023
Place: GDG Challenges platform
Timeline: 10 days

title: Fields
detail: Web, Mobile, AI, Cyber Security, Game Dev

title: Judging
detail: The judging criteria will be a scoring system taking into consideration the number and difficulty of solved challenges alongside the time needed for that

title: Registering
detail: Everyone is welcome to register for the challenges as they will be online

title: Field selection
detail: A participant has to choose a specific field to participate in

title: Challenges plateform
detail: Find Devfest challenges at GDG Challenges plateform: gdg.challenges.com

title: Participation
detail: You can participate by signing up in the GDG challenges plateform

title: Prizes
detail: Prizes include computer components, software subscriptions and hoodies

title: Rules
detail: Cheating will disqualify the participant in order to preserve the integrity of the competition

title: Leaderboard
detail: There will be a leaderboard on the Challenges plateform for every field. It will get freezed on the last phase of the competition

title: Winning
detail: Winners will be chosen following the judging criterias and then revealed on our social media pages.

title: Competition format
detail: The Challenges are an individual competition

title: Mentorship
detail: There will be mentors and experts to provide hints and guidance throughout the competition

title: Certificates
detail: All participants solving a certain threshold of challenges will receive a certificate

title: Registration
detail: Registrations are open until right before the start of the challenges

title: Contact
detail: Additional clarifications and details can be obtained by reaching out to GDG Algiers through the community server on Discord or on social media platforms

title: Date
detail: Date: from October 30th to December 1st, 2023

title: Theme
detail: The theme of this year will be Smart Cities. Subthemes, as well as the hacker guide, will be provided only to the participants.

title: Teams
detail: Each team has 5 participants at most.

title: Registration
detail:
The registration process for DevFest 2023 is simple and convenient. Follow these steps to secure your spot:
- Visit our official Devfest'23 website through the link : providing the link 
- Click on the "Register Now" button to start the registration process.
- You will be guided through the registration form where you can select to register for the hackathon. 
- Once your registration is complete, you will receive a confirmation email later on whether you are accepted or not, with more details about devfest'23.

title: Project submission
detail:
Each team will submit their project in DevPost including:
- Project description
- Project presentation
- Source code

title: Judging
detail:
Judging criteria include:
- Creativity and innovation
- Clean implementation
- Business value

title: Prizes
detail: Hackathon prizes include a trip to anywhere in the world. (jk, it is to be fixed)

title: Workshops and mentorship
detail: While there are no workshops scheduled for the hackathon, there will be mentorship sessions where our mentors will be available to assist you whenever you need guidance or have questions during the hackathon.

title: Hackathon pack
detail:
Things you need to bring: 
Your laptop, with its bag (Charger /keyboard/ mouse), phone and charger, headphones if you have a tendency to listen to something in the background, sweaters and one T-shirt (You'll get a new one at the event ), and a sleeping bag.

title: Mentorship
detail: There will be mentors to help you with your issues, who are experts in their fields.
